header: Remind Everyone How To Behave Toward Other People

verse: Be reminding them to be subject to rulers, to authorities; to be obedient; to be ready for every good work;
to blaspheme no one; to be non-quarrelsome, kind, demonstrating all gentleness toward all people.

header: For We Also Were Once Foolish And Deceived, But God Saved Us By His Mercy And Grace

verse: For we also were once foolish, disobedient, being deceived, being-slaves to various desires and pleasures, spending life in malice and envy, detested, hating one another.
But when the kindness and love-for-mankind of our Savior God appeared,
He saved us— not by works which we did in [our] righteousness, but according-to His mercy, through a washing of  regeneration and a renewing of  the Holy Spirit,
Whom He richly poured-out upon us through Jesus Christ our Savior,
in order that having been declared-righteous by the grace of that One, we might become heirs according-to the hope of eternal life.

header: Speak With Confidence, So That Believers Take The Lead In Good Works

verse: But be shunning foolish controversies and genealogies and quarrels and battles pertaining-to-the-Law. For they are unprofitable and worthless.
Be declining a divisive person after a first and second admonition,
knowing that such a one has been perverted and is sinning, being self-condemned.
When I send Artemas or Tychicus to you, be diligent to come to me in Nicopolis, for I have determined to spend-the-winter there.
Diligently send-forward Zenas the lawyer and Apollos, in order that nothing may be lacking for them.
And let our people also be learning to take-the-lead in good works for necessary needs, in order that they may not be unfruitful.
All the ones with me greet you. Greet the ones loving us in the faith. Grace be with you all.
